text:
AccessLogValue doesn't implement %{Referer}i and %{User-Agent}i. I fixed it. 
How do I submit the changes?
creator: catkins@spcmg.com
remm@apache.org
text:
The AccessLogValve implements the "combined" log format which includes these
headers. This has been added in 4.0 Beta 7.

You don't understand, I don't want the "combined" format, I want a custom 
format that includes these values. I modified the class to handle these 
formats and run a little faster.
creator: catkins@spcmg.com
stuart.roebuck@adolos.co.uk
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11075 ***
